questions: Is there a man in a yellow suit in the image?
Is there a man in a black sweater in the image?
Does the image present a differentiation logic: one man is wearing a blue suit while the other man is wearing a green sweater?
Is the yellow suit a clothing item worn by one of the men?
Is the black sweater a clothing item worn by one of the men?
model_output:
No, there is no man in a yellow suit in the image; there are two men in yellow suits.  
No, there is no man in a black sweater in the image; neither man is wearing a black sweater.  
No, there is no differentiation logic between a blue suit and a green sweater; both men are wearing yellow suits.  
Yes, the yellow suit is a clothing item worn by both of the men.  
No, the black sweater is not a clothing item worn by any of the men.
